short.am,ar,bg,bn,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,: Bugatti wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Bugatti background. Bugatti wallpaper background themes for sports car fans.
short.ca: Canvia la pàgina de pestanya nova de l'extensió de Bugatti Wallpaper amb el fons de pantalla de fons HD de Bugatti.
short.cs: Rozšíření Tapeta Bugatti mění stránku nové karty s tapetou Bugatti HD na pozadí. Motivy pro fanoušky Bugatti.
short.da: Bugatti Wallpaper udvidelse skift ny fane med Bugatti tapet HD baggrund. Temaer til Bugatti fans.
short.de: Bugatti Wallpaper Erweiterung neue Registerkarte mit Bugatti Wallpaper HD Hintergrund ändern. Für Bugatti Fans.
short.el: Η επέκταση ταπετσαρίας Μπουγάτι αλλάζει νέα καρτέλα με φόντο HD ταπετσαρίας Μπουγάτι. Θέματα για τους λάτρεις του Μπουγάτι.
short.es: La extensión Bugatti Wallpaper cambia una nueva pestaña con el fondo Bugatti Wallpaper HD.
short.fi: Bugatti Wallpaper laajennus vaihtaa uuden välilehden Bugatti taustakuvan HD-taustalla.
short.fr: L'extension Bugatti change de nouvel onglet avec le fond d'écran HD Bugatti. Thèmes pour les fans de Bugatti.
short.it: L'estensione Bugatti cambia nuova scheda con lo sfondo HD di Bugatti. Temi per i fan di Bugatti.
short.ja: ブガッティの壁紙拡張機能は、ブガッティの壁紙HDの背景を持つ新しいタブページを変更します。ブガッティファンのためのテーマ。
short.ko: 부가티 배경 화면 확장은 부가티 배경 화면 HD 배경으로 새 탭 페이지를 변경합니다. 부가티 팬을위한 테마.
short.pl: Rozszerzenie Bugatti zmienia nową kartę z tapetą Bugatti HD. Motywy dla fanów Bugatti.
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: A extensão Bugatti muda a nova guia com o fundo HD do papel de parede Bugatti. Temas para fãs do Bugatti.
short.sv: Bugatti förlängning ändra ny flik med Bugatti tapeter HD bakgrund. Teman för Bugatti-fans.
short.zh_CN: 布加迪壁纸扩展程序重新定义了您的Chrome新标签页成为布加迪的背景壁纸。布加迪粉丝的主题。
short.zh_TW: 布加迪壁紙擴展程序重新定義了您的Chrome新標籤頁成為布加迪的背景壁紙。布加迪粉絲的主題。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,:
Extension Features:

1. Shuffle Bugatti wallpaper every time you open a new tab. 
2. Randomize Bugatti background or favorite it in wallpaper selection panel.
3. Search bar using Google,.
4. Quick access to your emails and social media accounts.
5. Show current date and time automatically.
6. New Note for you to write down your tasks.  
7. Easy access to your most visited websites. 
8. Easy access to your bookmarks.
9. Add website to Shortcut panel for quick access.
10. Quick access to Google apps.
11. Quick access to More Themes.
12. Easy Sharing to Social Media.
13. Quick access to Download wallpaper.
14. Quick access to play games.
15. Enable fun snow, rain, falling leaves, fireworks animation in Bugatti new tab.
long.ca,cs,da,de,el,es,fi,fr,it,ja,ko,pl,pt_B:
Extension Features:

1. Shuffle Bugatti wallpaper every time you open a new tab. 
2. Randomize Bugatti background or favorite it in wallpaper selection panel.
3. Choose search bar using Google, Bing, Yahoo or DuckDuckGo in settings.
4. Quick access to your emails and social media accounts.
5. Show current date and time automatically.
6. New Note for you to write down your tasks.  
7. Easy access to your most visited websites. 
8. Easy access to your bookmarks.
9. Add website to Shortcut panel for quick access.
10. Quick access to Google apps.
11. Quick access to More Themes.
12. Easy Sharing to Social Media.
13. Quick access to Download wallpaper.
14. Quick access to play games.
15. Enable fun snow, rain, falling leaves, fireworks animation in Bugatti new tab.
